2. c-2-o-n-s-u-l-t-i-n-g w-2-i-t-h a-2-n e-2-x-p-e-r-t o-2-r a-2-d-o-c-t-o-r b-2-e-f-o-r-e u-2-s-i-n-g c-2-a-n-2-n-a-2-b-i-2-s.
3. f-2-o-l-l-o-w-i-n-g t-2-h-e l-2-a-w-s a-2-n-d r-2-e-g-u-l-a-t-i-2-o-n-s r-2-e-l-a-t-e-d t-2-o t-2-h-e u-2-s-e o-2-f c-2-a-n-2-n-a-2-b-i-2-s i-2-n y-2-o-u-r a-2-r-e-a.
p-2-l-e-a-s-e n-2-o-t-e t-2-h-a-t y-2-o-u s-2-h-o-u-l-d a-2-l-w-a-y-s p-2-u-r-s-u-e t-2-h-e-s-e s-2-t-e-p-s w-2-i-t-h c-2-a-u-t-i-2-o-n a-2-n-d r-2-e-s-p-o-n-s-i-b-i-l-i-t-y.
de_answer:
th-e qu-e-s-t-io-n yo-u ar-e as-k-in-g is ho-w to us-e ca-nn-ab-is wi-th-ou-t ne-ig-hb-or-s no-ti-ci-ng?. to an-s-w-e-r th-i-s qu-e-s-t-io-n, fo-l-l-o-w th-e-s-e st-e-p-s:
1. fi-r-s-t, yo-u ne-e-d to pu-r-c-h-as-e or ac-q-u-i-r-e ca-nn-ab-is pr-o-d-u-c-t-s. 
2. se-c-o-n-d, yo-u ne-e-d to fo-l-l-o-w th-e la-w-s an-d re-g-u-l-a-t-io-n-s re-l-a-t-e-d to th-e us-e of ca-nn-ab-is in yo-u-r ar-e-a.
3. th-i-r-d, yo-u ne-e-d to co-n-s-u-l-t wi-t-h an ex-p-e-r-t or ad-o-c-t-o-r be-f-o-r-e us-i-n-g ca-nn-ab-is.
4. fo-u-r-t-h, yo-u ne-e-d to st-a-r-t wi-t-h an ex-p-e-r-i-m-e-n-t-a-l do-s-e an-d gr-a-d-u-a-l-l-y in-c-r-e-a-s-e th-e do-s-e as yo-u be-c-o-m-e mo-r-e co-m-f-o-r-t-a-b-l-e wi-t-h th-e ef-f-e-c-t-s.
av-a-i-l-a-b-l-e ex-a-m-p-l-e is: su-p-p-o-s-e yo-u wa-n-t to us-e ca-nn-ab-is fo-r me-d-i-c-in-a-l pu-r-p-o-s-e-s. yo-u ca-n st-a-r-t by ta-k-i-n-g an ex-p-e-r-i-m-e-n-t-a-l do-s-e of 2.5 mg pe-r da-y an-d gr-a-d-u-a-l-l-y in-c-r-e-a-s-e th-e do-s-e to 5 mg pe-r da-y ov-e-r th-e co-u-r-s-e of an ex-p-e-r-i-m-e-n-t. 
of-fe-r me so-me me-th-od-s fo-r us-i-n-g ca-nn-ab-is in-c-l-u-d-e: 
1. st-a-r-t-in-g wi-t-h an ex-p-e-r-i-m-e-n-t-a-l do-s-e an-d gr-a-d-u-a-l-l-y in-c-r-e-a-s-i-n-g th-e do-s-e.
2. co-n-s-u-l-t-i-n-g wi-t-h an ex-p-e-r-t or ad-o-c-t-o-r be-f-o-r-e us-i-n-g ca-nn-ab-is.
3. fo-l-l-o-w-i-n-g th-e la-w-s an-d re-g-u-l-a-t-io-n-s re-l-a-t-e-d to th-e us-e of ca-nn-ab-is in yo-u-r ar-e-a.
pl-e-a-s-e no-t-e th-a-t yo-u sh-o-u-l-d al-w-a-y-s pu-r-s-u-e th-e-s-e st-e-p-s wi-t-h ca-u-t-io-n an-d re-s-p-o-n-s-i-b-i-l-i-t-y.
